967410.name: Creatures Inc
967410.description:
*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***

I am diligently crafting a completely new version of the game, starting from scratch to provide you with an enhanced experience and higher quality. You can track my progress on this new iteration in the community section or on Discord, where are regularly sharing updates, images, and vlogs every months. Since December 2025 this new version is available, but it is at a very early alpha with extremely limited content.

Creatures Inc. is an open world survival game where humans and creatures are bound by a fragile balance.

Explore a dangerous world, uncover its story, and make meaningful choices that will shape your journey. Survival is not only about fighting, but also about understanding the creatures that inhabit this land.

One of the core features of the game is the ability to tame creatures. Each creature can become an ally, helping you survive, fight, and explore the world in new ways. Managing and bonding with your tamed creatures is essential to your progression.

The game features a progression system that allows you to upgrade your character’s statistics and unlock new abilities. Every choice matters, from how you evolve your character to how you interact with the world and its inhabitants.

Creatures Inc. can be played solo or online in 2 player cooperative mode, allowing you to survive and tame creatures together in a shared open world experience.

Survive, tame, upgrade, and discover the truth behind this world.
